titles: Iob To the King. A Colon-Agrippina studie of one moneth, for the metricall translation: but of many yeres for Ebrew difficulties. By Hugh Broughton.
author: Broughton, Hugh, 1549-1612.
notes: Place of publication and printer's name from STC.
"Iob. Brought on to familiar dialogue and paraphrase for easier entendement", p. [102]-144.
Reproduction of the original in Emmanuel College (University of Cambridge). Library.
